scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:processImage && npm run deploy:translateText && npm run deploy:saveResult && npm run deploy:assistant && npm run deploy:readResult && npm run deploy:twilioCall
scripts.deploy:processImage: gcloud beta functions deploy ocr-extract --source https://source.developers.google.com/projects/cloud-function-ocr-demo/repos/cloud-function-ocr-demo/moveable-aliases/master --trigger-bucket cloud-function-ocr-demo__image --entry-point processImage
scripts.deploy:translateText: gcloud beta functions deploy ocr-translate --source https://source.developers.google.com/projects/cloud-function-ocr-demo/repos/cloud-function-ocr-demo/moveable-aliases/master --trigger-topic TRANSLATE_TOPIC --entry-point translateText
scripts.deploy:saveResult: gcloud beta functions deploy ocr-save --source https://source.developers.google.com/projects/cloud-function-ocr-demo/repos/cloud-function-ocr-demo/moveable-aliases/master --trigger-topic RESULT_TOPIC --entry-point saveResult
scripts.deploy:readResult: gcloud beta functions deploy ocr-read --source https://source.developers.google.com/projects/cloud-function-ocr-demo/repos/cloud-function-ocr-demo/moveable-aliases/master --trigger-topic READ_TOPIC --entry-point readResult
scripts.deploy:assistant: gcloud beta functions deploy ocr-assistant --source https://source.developers.google.com/projects/cloud-function-ocr-demo/repos/cloud-function-ocr-demo/moveable-aliases/master --trigger-http --entry-point assistant
scripts.deploy:twilioCall: gcloud beta functions deploy ocr-twilio-call --source https://source.developers.google.com/projects/cloud-function-ocr-demo/repos/cloud-function-ocr-demo/moveable-aliases/master --trigger-http --entry-point twilioCall
scripts.deploy:all:local: npm run deploy:processImage:local && npm run deploy:translateText:local && npm run deploy:saveResult:local && npm run deploy:assistant:local
